summary: Completed testing of new deployment-ready features for Ucycle mobile-first live-map app. Backend APIs fully functional (22/22 tests passed). Frontend features working well including category filter chips, search functionality, menu options, admin panel access, and PWA manifest. Minor UI interaction issues with dynamic elements but core functionality intact.

ui_bugs.issue: Some dynamic elements (menu items, markers) become detached from DOM during rapid interactions

passed_tests: Category filter chips display (All, Furniture, General)
Search bar opens when clicking search icon
Search for location returns geocoding results
Menu shows Admin Panel, Refresh Map, and Nearby Notifications options
Post creation drawer has solid white background
PWA manifest.json accessible and properly configured
Admin PIN verification and dashboard access
